thread.title: Report: Tiger doesn't 'look good,' doubtful for Masters
thread.title_full: Report: Tiger doesn't 'look good,' doubtful for Masters

author: nbcsports.com
title: Report: Tiger doesn't 'look good,' doubtful for Masters
text:
RSS 
Considering the lack of official updates from Camp Tiger Woods , this likely won't come as a surprise. 
A Golf World report citing multiple sources indicates that the 14-time major winner "seems unlikely" to play the Masters in three weeks. 
Per the report: "According to multiple sources, Woods has not been able to play or practice since withdrawing from the Dubai Desert Classic last month because of back spasms. ... 
"Another source said that he saw Woods recently and he 'didn't look good,' adding that while he hopes he is back soon, Woods doesn't look close to being ready and that a return at the Masters would be too soon. The source added that all Woods has been able to do of late is putt." 
Just last week at the Valspar Championship , Steve Stricker told reporters while he has not seen Woods recently, he has been in contact with those who have, and the news wasn't encouraging. 
“He’s working hard at it, but I don’t think he’s doing that well right now physically,” Stricker said. 
In the event Woods does skip the year's first major, it will mark the third time in the last four years that Woods has failed to show up at Augusta National. Article Tags:
